#file 2:
with open(AC_3, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    f.write('''...''')
    f.write("\n")

    saved_package_name_uid = _get_saved_package_name_uid_with_icon()
    if not saved_package_name_uid:
        f.write('                "Seem you have not given rights for any app", "", 2,\n')
    else:
        for package_name, uid, icon in saved_package_name_uid:
            app_name = get_app_name(uid)
            if app_name:
                app_name = " (%s)" % app_name
            f.write('                "%s%s", "uid: %s, icon: %s", 0,\n' % (package_name, app_name, uid, icon))

    f.write('''...''')
    f.write("\n")
